text.0_Chapter, 0_Paragraph: O judges of the land, love justice! Think well of YHWH, and seek Him with purity of heart.
text.0_Chapter, 1_Paragraph: For He will be found by those who have not  tested him, reveal himself to those who believe in Him.
text.0_Chapter, 2_Paragraph: And malicious thoughts separate from YHWH, and on the day of vengeance will the fools' foolishness become known.
text.0_Chapter, 3_Paragraph: For wisdom will not come to an evil heart, and will not rest in a sinning soul.
text.0_Chapter, 4_Paragraph: For a spirit of comprehension hates duplicity and flees foolish thought, and Sin will defy it.
text.0_Chapter, 5_Paragraph: Good is a spirit of wisdom, the one who blasphemes with his lips it shall not deliver, for YHWH is a witness to his thoughts, investigates thoroughly his heart and listens to his tongue.
text.0_Chapter, 6_Paragraph: For the Honor of YHWH fulfills the entire Earth, and the One who sustains all understands everything.
text.0_Chapter, 7_Paragraph: Therefore, the one who loves evil schemes will not [be able to] hide from Him, from judgment and reprehension he shall not be absolved.
text.0_Chapter, 8_Paragraph: For the words of the wicked will surely be demanded, and the voice of their words will come to YHWH to return them from their rebellion.
text.0_Chapter, 9_Paragraph: His ear hears [every] word in fury, and the voice of protest is not concealed from Him.
text.0_Chapter, 10_Paragraph: Thus, beware and do not protest, for it holds no avail, and guard your tongue from speaking evil, what you mutter to yourself shall not fall to the earth, a deceitful tongue kills a person.
text.0_Chapter, 11_Paragraph: Do not seek death with the twistedness of your ways, and do not bring about annihilation with the action of your hands.
text.0_Chapter, 12_Paragraph: For YHWH has not chosen death, and He does not desire the annihilation of life.
text.0_Chapter, 13_Paragraph: To support them forever has He created them, and the peace of the peoples of the earth is in their hands; the venom of annihilation is not between them, and the netherworld is not on the dust of His regin.
text.0_Chapter, 14_Paragraph: For righteousness will not die, but the yield of wickedness is death.
text.0_Chapter, 15_Paragraph: Which the wicked brought about by their words and their exploits, as on a friend did they trust in it [i.e. death], and they met their end and ceased from it, with it they were among the conspirators, and their future is to be with it.
text.1_Chapter, 0_Paragraph: For those who have slipped spoke in their hearts, and with their tongues, saying: "The days of our lives are short, and full of toil. A man is not saved from death, and there is known no man who has returned from it."
text.1_Chapter, 1_Paragraph: "We were born in mishap, and we shall be as though we were not. For the spirit of our nostrils is smoke, and our words are as a spark rising from our hearts."
text.1_Chapter, 2_Paragraph: "For it is extinguished. The flesh returns to dust, and the soul disperses like a light breeze."
